name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Infrastructure Engineer with 13+ years of experience in DevOps practices and delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Helm**, **Kubernetes**, **GitLab**, **Jenkins**, **Linux**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **Chef**, **MariaDB**, **MySQL**, **Galera clustering**, **S3**, and **Python**. Experienced in building and deploying cloud-native systems with a strong focus on automation and orchestration.

Skilled in CI/CD pipeline implementation and microservices architecture, supporting seamless integration and deployment processes. Strong background in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Excellent communication skills enhance collaboration with cross-functional teams and drive effective project outcomes.
